about.feedbackInfo: {{appName}} ({{commitSha}}) is in the early stages of development. If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to <OpenIssueLink>open an issue</OpenIssueLink> <ExternalLinkIcon /> on our GitHub.
about.iconLibrary: The icon library used is copyrighted by <IconLibraryLink /> <ExternalLinkIcon /> and cannot be redistributed.
about.licenseInfo: {{appName}} is and will always be a free and open-source project. It is licensed under {{license}}.

guess_code_language.description: Major programming languages that use models to infer unlabeled code blocks
guess_code_language.label: Guess code language

reader_render_inline_style.description: Allows rendering of the inline style of the original HTML.
reader_render_inline_style.label: Render inline style

reduce_motion.description: Reducing the motion of elements to improve performance and reduce energy consumption
reduce_motion.label: Reduce motion

data_persist.description: Persist data locally to enable offline access and local search.
data_persist.label: Persist data for offline usage

hover.description: Automatically mark entries as read when hovered.
hover.label: Mark as read when hovering

render.description: Automatically mark single-level entries (e.g. social media posts, pictures, video views) as read when they enter the view.
render.label: Mark as read when in the view

scroll.description: Automatically mark entries as read when scrolled out of the view.
scroll.label: Mark as read when scrolling

rebuild_database.description: If you are experiencing rendering issues, rebuilding the database may solve them.
rebuild_database.label: Rebuild Database
rebuild_database.title: Rebuild Database

warning.line1: Rebuilding the database will clear all your local data.
warning.line2: Are you sure you want to continue?

send_anonymous_data.description: By opting to send anonymized telemetry data, you contribute to improving the overall user experience of Follow.
send_anonymous_data.label: Send anonymous data

enable.description: Display 'Save media to Eagle' button when available.
enable.label: Enable

enable.description: Display 'Save to Instapaper' button when available.
enable.label: Enable

enable.description: Display 'Save to Readwise' button when available.
enable.label: Enable

token.description: You can get it here: readwise.io/access_token.
token.label: Readwise Access Token

integration.tip: Tip: Your sensitive data is stored locally and is not uploaded to the server.
integration.title: Integration

codeOptions.betaUser: 1. Find a beta user who invites you.
codeOptions.discord: 2. Join our Discord server and occasionally get gifts.
codeOptions.xAccount: 3. Follow our X account, and get gifts from time to time.
